DOC.brief_title: Teleassisted Surgery for Gynecological Disease in Obese Patients - OB-ALFX
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this Phase II prospective single-institutional study is to assess feasibility and early complications rate of Telelap ALF-X surgical treatment in obese patients affected by gynecological disease.
DOC.criteria: informed consent 30 â‰¤ BMI < 40 ASA < III Ovarian Cyst Prophylactic bilateral salpingooophorectomy Ectopic Pregnancy Pelvic Inflammatory Disease Sterility/Infertility Benign uterine disease (fibromatosis, adenomyosis) Endometrial hiperplasia Earlystage Endometrial Cancer Preneoplastic lesions of the cervix IA1 Cervical Cancer Pelvic endometriosis Pregnancy Liver disease Coagulopathies Clinical conditions contraindicating laparoscopy
